titleStmt.title: A pindarick ode, upon the death of His Late Sacred Majesty King Charles the Second

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Leonard Lichfield ... for Anthony Stephens ...,

notesStmt.note: Not to be confused with A pindarick ode on the death by J.H., the present work begins: "Alas he's dead--the dismal sound."
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
